General.Name: Jilin Chemical Fibre Co Ltd
General.Description: Jilin Chemical Fibre Stock Co.,Ltd produces and sells chemical fiber in China. The company offers bio-based rayons, bamboo fibers, acrylic fibers, carbon fibers, chemical fiber pulps, and yarns. It also exports its products to approximately 30 countries and regions, including Asia, Europe, the United States, and Africa. The company was founded in 1960 and is based in Jilin, China.
